Banner.Description: I am a Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in building web applications using both frontend and backend technologies.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am a Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in building web applications using both frontend and backend technologies.
Over the years, I have taken on various roles, including Systems Analyst, Backend Developer, and Frontend Developer.
I am passionate about solving complex problems, optimizing applications, and contributing to innovative projects.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Engineer
Description: Implementing new features in existing applications
Enhancing and optimizing previously developed functionalities.
Assisting new colleagues in onboarding and integrating into the team.
Developing new applications that are now successfully in production.
This role has provided me with numerous learning opportunities, and I am truly grateful for the experience.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Engineer
Description: Modernizing and enhancing the GUI of existing web applications.
Developing and integrating new features into existing web applications.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Junior Web Developer
Description: Converted PSD designs into fully functional, responsive HTML structures for newsletters and landing pages.
This role enhanced my expertise in frontend development and backend integration, allowing me to successfully execute various web projects.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Developed web applications to monitor gas emissions during the leather processing workflow.
Designed a system to track the amount of gas released at different production stages.
Ensured better control and compliance with environmental standards.
Built the frontend using AngularJS 2 for a dynamic and responsive UI.
Developed the backend in Java, managing business logic and data processing.
Used SQL queries to perform CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) efficiently.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Internship
Description: Assisted in the implementation of two new modules within an existing CRM application.
Gained hands-on experience in frontend and backend development.
Worked with database management to ensure seamless data integration.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GS1 Data Systems
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: These projects enhanced my expertise in developing full-stack web applications, from design to deployment, and strengthened my problem-solving, optimization, and team collaboration skills.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: COMTEC NET
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Enhanced the GUI of web applications by modernizing interfaces and improving user experience. Developed and integrated new features while optimizing backend performance to ensure scalable and secure applications. Collaborated with team members to design, implement, and deploy solutions efficiently.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four Card Feature Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social Proof Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a design made in Figma. Angular was used for development along with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ Accordion Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Frequently asked questions accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple design of a page featuring a profile card with basic information of a person.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
